awd_titl_txt: CISE Research Instrumentation:  VLSI Design for Test        Instrumentation
awd_abstract_narration: Verification and logic simulation systems shall be developed               within this undertaking and dedicated to projects involving VLSI                design-for test.  Individual projects include:                                                                                                                  *  Diagnostic chip for IEEE Standard 1149.1 boundary-scan boards.                                                                                               *  Self-test using MISR and parallel shift register sequence                       generator.                                                                                                                                                   *  Burst-error correcting and self-repair ROM.                                                                                                                  *  Test by approximation of Boolean function system.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
